subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Edison EVP?
author: Lisby
full_text:
Just as an aside, Misty--I've heard recordings of Edison's voice and  
this struck me right away as a very similar one. Each time I listen  
to it, I feel more strongly that it could be him.

The third recording "We have conscious..." is equally as amazing.

Wonderful stuff!

Ann
